name: Orb of Alchemy
effect: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item

name: Orb of Alteration
effect: Reforges a magic item with new random modifiers

name: Orb of Annulment
effect: Removes a random modifier from an item

name: Orb of Augmentation
effect: Enchants a magic item with a new random modifier

name: Blessed Orb
effect: Randomizes the numeric values of the implicit modifier of an item

name: Chaos Orb
effect: Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers

name: Divine Orb
effect: Randomizes the numeric values of the random modifiers on an item

name: Exalted Orb
effect: Enchants a rare item with a new random modifier

name: Regal Orb
effect: Upgrades a magic item to a rare item

name: Orb of Scouring
effect: Removes all modifiers from an item

name: Orb of Transmutation
effect: Upgrades a normal item to a magic item
